actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the department in which the United States Coast Guard is operating to cause the vessel Alaskan Shores to be documented as a vessel of the United States so as to be entitled to engage in the coastwise trade.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to cause the vessel Alaskan Shores to be documented as a vessel of the United States with the privilege of engaging in the coastwise trade.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the department in which the United States Coast Guard is operating to cause the vessel Alaskan Shores to be documented as a vessel of the United States so as to be entitled to engage in the coastwise trade.
